summary: Basic Breezehome Basement , no fancy features, just plenty storage space.
descriptionHtml:
I ve been using this mod myself like forever, and eventually thought there may be others interested in a simple storage cellar for Breezehome. 
There are many Breezehome extentions/modifications already, but most have too many unnecessary features for my personal taste. So, this mod is not for you if you re looking for a fancy Breezehome extention. It s just a simple basement of realistic Breezehome size, with a lot of storage containers. There are no additional crafting stations, as you can find all you need in Whiterun. Also no sorting options, it s up to you to organize your collections any way you want.
The basement is accessible through a simple trapdoor in the side room.
It s companion friendly. DLC independent.

Installation: just drop the esp in your data folder. 
Not compatible with other mods that change Breezehome.

Credits to Bethesda, for this amazing game and the Creation Kit
author: slbrgt
